ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
methodOfCooking: Grill the shrimp on a preheated grill until cooked through, about 2-3 minutes per side. Serve immediately with a squeeze of lemon juice.

Preheat the oven to 400°F. In a small bowl, mix together the olive oil, garlic, thyme, and rosemary. Rub the mixture all over the chicken and season with salt and pepper. Place the chicken in a roasting pan and bake for 1 hour, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F. Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes before carving and serving.

ingredients: 1 pound pasta, such as fusilli or penne
methodOfCooking: Cook the pasta according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside. In a large bowl, mix together the pesto, sun-dried tomatoes, Parmesan cheese, and pine nuts. Add the cooked pasta to the bowl and toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipeName: Grilled Salmon with Lemon and Dill
methodOfCooking: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. In a small bowl, mix together the olive oil, garlic, and dill. Rub the mixture all over the salmon fillets and season with salt and pepper. Place the lemon slices on the grill and cook for 1-2 minutes per side, until charred. Remove the lemon slices from the grill and set aside. Grill the salmon fillets for 4-5 minutes per side, until cooked through. Serve immediately with the grilled lemon slices.
